name: Harvest x Harvest
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 52.

Appreciate if you give a rating and some feedback on this game. Maybe a follow as well? Credits:

Not Vexara Anymore#4469 for artwork

me for anything else

How to Play?

Keep your crops from the greedy crows. You also need to plant in case they are harvested or eaten by crows. Don't get killed by the angry red crows as well!

Master Planting Guide

Get seeds from the barrel on the top-right of the farm. Yellow seeds are potato seeds. They take shorter time to full grown but give less money.
Green seeds are carrot seeds. They take longer time to sell but give more money.
When there are both types of seeds in the sack, carrot is preferentially planted.
After you planted, you need to get water from the lake at the south to the farm. Water is given to the farm section first stepped on.
To harvest, attack it.

Keys

WASD - Move

Left Click - Attack / Plant Seed

Right Click - Grab Seeds / Fill Water Bucket

TAB - Open Upgrade Menu

ESC - Open Pause Menu

P - Restart

Upgrades:

Increase player speed

Increase sack capacity

Increase water capacity

Increase attack range

Deploy scarecrow (Kill crows in range instantly, with a cost of 1 time remain. Initial deploy time is 5 seconds)
